column1: The 12 closely related enzymes of the PKC family are divided into three classes: conventional ( cPKCs: alpha betaI betaII and gamma require Ca2 + and diacylglycerol ( DAG); novel ( nPKCs: delta, epsilon, eta, theta and mu) require DAG; and atypical ( aPKCs: xi, iota and lambda) require neither Ca2 + nor DAG.
